thread.title: Boeing Board Approves Quarterly Dividend
thread.title_full: Boeing Board Approves Quarterly Dividend - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Boeing Board Approves Quarterly Dividend
text:
Boeing
CHICAGO , Oct. 26, Boeing [NYSE: BA] President and Chief Executive Officer Dennis Muilenburg reports that the board of directors today declared a regular quarterly dividend of ninety one ($0.91) cents per share.
The dividend is payable December 4, 2015 , to shareholders of record as of November 6, 2015 .
Contact:
Communications (312) 544-2002
Investor Relations (312) 544-2140
